description:
"Alexa, open Sorting Ceremony" to discover your house.

There’s nothing hidden in your head
The Sorting Hat can’t see,
So try me on and I will tell you
Where you ought to be.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Sorting Ceremony to sort me
name: Potterhead Sorting Ceremony
shortDescription: The enchanted PotterHead Sorting Ceremony looks into the head of the wearer to sort a student into one of the four Hogwarts houses,
